Welcome to Ultimate Rock-Paper-Scissors!

 To play Ultimate RPS, secretly choose Rock, Paper or Scissors. Then hold the phone in your right hand, and bring it down into your left hand three times.

 You can play against another Ultimate RPS player or against a player using the old-fashioned analog version of Rock-Paper-Scissors (their hands).

 Images are used from the Open Clip Art Library (www.openclipart.org).
